project0.additional: You can take a peek at a few projects I have developed, or go ahead and already schedule a call!

project1.title: Time Capsule
project1.description: A franchise of self-service totem for recording messages to be delivered in the future, like a time capsule. During an event (ie. wedding, graduation, anniversary) guests access the application through a touchscreen totem machine, record video messages, and then the totem starts to synchronize with the server (through an internet connection) that uploads the videos. On the server-side, the application schedule the videos to be sent in the future.

description.partOne: A platform that can be purchased by dealerships to showcase and sell their vehicles. Currently being developed for two dealerships. It comprises the whole process of buying a vehicle, from choosing the model and accessories, to methods of payment. A robust project connected to multiple external APIs, using
description.partTwo: to manage the different dealerships under the same code.
scrips were developed in order to automatize the whole process for an online shop of digital files. Through
description.partThree: connections it identifies when a purchase was made, generates encrypted and custom watermarked files, uploads them to a cloud provider, and lastly sends the buyer an email with the links for these files. The first goal of the project was to increase layers of
description.partFour: against digital piracy, and as soon as this was met, it was expanded to managing the purchases from start to end.
